thread.title: This Artist Turns Couture Into Walking Sculptures
thread.title_full: This Artist Turns Couture Into Walking Sculptures

author: Tori Latham
title: This Artist Turns Couture Into Walking Sculptures
text: Thirty-two-year-old London-based artist Daniel Lismore calls his artwork “fabric monsters” — he designs over-the-top outfits that he wears on a day-to-day basis. Recently featured at the SCAD Museum of Art in Atlanta, Lismore uses a mix of couture and designer pieces ( Yves Saint Laurent and Alexander... More »
